MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA6 postcode area of Frodsham, affecting customers on Top Road, Hazelhurst Road, Newlands Close, Warren Court and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:28 pm. Our engineers have established that there is faulty network equipment and that repairs will be complex so we are arranging generators to restore power, and this should happen by 9 am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:21 am on 11th December, 2020.
